title: The Adventurers Guild
description: …in which he attempted to play through all notable graphical adventure games.

title: All the Adventures | Renga in Blue
description: Wherein I play and blog about every adventure game ever made in (nearly) chronological order. These are sorted (mostly) in the order I played the games. I think they’re all worth reading! How….

title: The Arcade Blogger
description: A blog celebrating the history and preservation of Classic Arcade Video Games from the 70s and 80s.

title: Bad Game Hall of Fame
description: Dedicated to giving bad games the due process they deserve.

title: Buried Treasure
description: Reviewing the indie games everyone else missed.

title: The Candybox Blog
description: I make art that some people call games.

title: CD-ROM Journal
description: Exploring multimedia games and software of the 90s and beyond.

title: Critical Distance
description: "Where is all the good writing about games?".

title: The CRPG Addict
description: A blog in which a dedicated addict plays through all PC computer role-playing games (CRPGs), in chronological order.

title: cRPG Blog
description: Index to the cRPG blog on cRPG history, reviews, rankings and design.

title: The Digital Antiquarian
description: A history of computer entertainment and digital culture by Jimmy Maher.

title: Distant Arcade
description: A gaming blog. We hope you enjoy all the future blogger fun time video games action we have in store.

title: Eastern Mind
description: a newly revived tumblelog project by Bruno de Figueiredo.

title: Ephemeral Enigmas
description: Giving offbeat, obscure, and forgotten games another look.

title: Game Boy Essentials
description: A project to review and talk about the essential games you must play on Game Boy to understand its appeal and its success.

title: GamerDad: Gaming with Children
description: Video game news, views, & reviews from a parental perspective, presented by Andrew S. Bub - The GamerDad.

title: Games That Weren't: Cancelled & Unreleased Games
description: An unreleased and cancelled video games archive with prototypes, developer history and assets for many computers and consoles of all ages.

title: The Genesis Temple
description: Articles and reviews about videogame design of the present and the past, showcasing titles relevant for particular plot and design choices.
